description: CD Serum/Plasma Circulating DNA Kit is specially designed for circulating DNA isolation from serum /plasma. Based on the unique silica membrane technology and its buffer solution, the Kit provides high purity and stable quality DNA free from proteins and other organic compounds. The purified DNA can be used directly for molecular biological experiments such as PCR analysis, Southern Blot and library construction.
name: CD Serum Plasma Circulating DNA Kit
